trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Gryllos is cursing up a storm.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Gryllos's assistant.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the slippery mandragora.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Gryllos's assistant.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_TODO_03<tab>While transfigured, speak with the slippery mandragora.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Gryllos's assistant.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_TODO_05<tab>Report to Gryllos.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_GRYLLOS_000_000<tab>Crows take that little sod! Where's it gone n─ Oh! I was unaware we had a visitor.

TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_GRYLLOS_000_001<tab>Pardon my language─I should hate to give a poor impression of Elpis with my unprofessional behavior. Alas, I am quite at my wits' end with this new cultivar. You are fortunate not to have overheard worse.

TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_GRYLLOS_000_002<tab>Its restorative properties are superlative, that much is true. Yet what possessed its creator to give it such nimble little legs, I shall never understand. I really must impress upon those fools at the Words of Halmarut that not <var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var> need be ambulatory!

TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_GRYLLOS_000_003<tab>I have tried leashing it, fencing it in, staring at it with all my might...each to no avail. Its resourcefulness is far beyond what one could─and I daresay <var 1A 02 /var>should<var 1A 01 /var>─wish of a vegetable.

TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_GRYLLOS_000_004<tab>Given that it shows such signs of sentience, however...perhaps it is possible for another intelligent creation to commune with it. Are you willing to make the attempt?

TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_GRYLLOS_000_005<tab>When it embarked upon its most recent bid for freedom, I sent my assistant after it. His own legs have grown quite powerful by this point, so with any luck, you will find them not too far to the west.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_GRYLLOS_000_010<tab>At this rate, we will certainly succeed at filling this star with life─but at what cost?
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_ASSISTANT04290_000_020<tab>Gryllos sent you to “commune” with the mandragora? Er...best of luck.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_ASSISTANT04290_000_030<tab>I assure you that it will respond if you speak to it. I cannot promise you will enjoy the experience, however...
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>The mandragora emits a screech not unlike the sound of a magitek airship's hull rending in twain, but it is unclear what this is meant to convey.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_ASSISTANT04290_000_050<tab>Did that...help?
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_ASSISTANT04290_000_051<tab>So even its fellow creations cannot understand it─what a pity. Granted, I did suspect its vocal organ was...unique.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_ASSISTANT04290_000_052<tab>Aha! If you took the same form, that may be less of an obstacle.

TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_ASSISTANT04290_000_053<tab>Though I am admittedly unversed in the original design specifications, I should have little difficulty transforming you into its mirror. Shall we have a go?
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_ASSISTANT04290_000_054<tab>Wonderful! Now, stand still...
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>In order to proceed further in the quest, you must be under the transfigured status.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>Should you accidentally remove your transfiguration, speak to Gryllos's assistant to be transfigured once more.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_ASSISTANT04290_000_060<tab>Yes, it is quite flattering on you. Now please, commune with the mandragora.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_ASSISTANT04290_000_065<tab>Odd... I would not have expected the magic to dispel so soon. Never you mind, though─there is more than enough where that came from.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>The mandragora emits a screech not unlike the sound of a magitek airship's hull rending in twain, but it is unclear what this is meant to convey.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_MANDRAGORA04290_000_075<tab>◎■■■♭×!
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_SYSTEM_000_076<tab>If anything, you understand even less than you did before.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_ASSISTANT04290_000_077<tab>How was that? ...Ah, one moment please.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_ASSISTANT04290_000_081<tab>Pardon me─I had not the slightest idea what you were saying. Would you mind repeating that?
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_ASSISTANT04290_000_082<tab>Foiled again! Nevertheless, we have gained valuable data.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_ASSISTANT04290_000_084<tab>Alas. Please inform Gryllos that it may be some time before I return...
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_GRYLLOS_000_090<tab>Did you locate the mandragora?
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_GRYLLOS_000_091<tab>Seemingly incapable of comprehensible communication, is it? Perhaps its degree of intelligence bears further scrutiny.

TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_GRYLLOS_000_092<tab>Of course, if upon further observation it <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> deemed sentient, it will be subject to even greater scrutiny to ensure that it can be safely set loose.
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_GRYLLOS_000_093<tab>To understand each creation in all its aspects, and conclusively prove it beneficial or detrimental to the star─such is our duty and burden as researchers...
TEXT_AKTKZG015_04290_GRYLLOS_000_094<tab>...At least we can say with certainty that its legs work.
